title: Simplify hero background and update About profile photo

requirements.summary: Remove hero decorative background pattern, overlays, and background image while preserving hero content and scroll behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: On the Hero section, there is no patterned background (the `.hero-pattern` visual effect is not visible/used).
On the Hero section, there is no background image rendered behind the hero content.
Hero headline, subtext, CTA buttons, and smooth scroll behavior to Services/Contact still work as before.
No new decorative/background design elements are introduced on the front page.

file_operations.description: Remove the hero background image element and any decorative overlay layers; remove usage of the `hero-pattern` class so the hero renders on a plain background while keeping all existing text, buttons, and scroll-to-section handlers unchanged.
Remove (or neutralize) the `.hero-pattern` styling definition in the global styles so the pattern effect is not present/used anywhere after hero cleanup.

requirements.summary: Replace the About Our Practice profile image with an uploaded photo served as a static asset, keeping the existing square framing and styling.
acceptanceCriteria: The About Our Practice section no longer uses `/assets/generated/ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png`.
One of the uploaded images (IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-2.jpg, IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-3.jpg, or IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-4.jpg) is added as a static asset and used as the About image source.
The About image remains square, cropped nicely (object-fit cover), and keeps the existing rounded/border/shadow styling.
No other sectionsâ€™ content or layout are changed.

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded photo as a frontend static asset so it can be referenced by the About section image tag.

Update the About section image `src` to use `/assets/IMG-20211208-WA0020~2-2.jpg` instead of `/assets/generated/ca-profile-placeholder.dim_800x800.png`, preserving the existing square frame and `object-cover` styling to avoid layout changes.
